Portal 2 for Steam, is a lot better than the Console version, and you will never get tired of this version. There are always more test chambers available to play. The main game is good enough, and it is extremely funny. However, If you want even more, you can download more levels to play.

Anyone who is someone should play this game. I recommend this game to anyone, no matter the age or skill level. Portal 2 takes you through an endless labyrinth of difficult and extremely fun puzzles, has an amazing storyline that you don't get as often anymore, and it even has a coop mode! 

I can guarentee that your money will be well spent

Fun game. The story is very interesting and funny. For some of the puzzles the biggest challenge is finding the one hidden tile on the wall that you can hit with a portal which becomes really annoying. If not for those few sections I would have enjoyed this more than the first Portal game.

The sequel to Portal. Now, Portal itself was a good enough game, but it was short. Now there is a sequel that is much longer, has workshop content and online co-operative play.

Who wouldn't like this game? 10/10
Good pastime for a casual puzzler. The puzzles were challenging, but rewarding when completed.

Best game I have ever played. I got it last year sometime and I am still obsessed with it. I have played the main story line many times over, as well as the co-op levels, and I never get bored of it. It challenges you to think in a different way on a different level than you might other wise, as well as gives you a good laugh here and there. Not to mention the community levels for both single player and co-op. Great game that you won't regret buying. Although you should play the first before you play the second, because you never go back. Also, WHERE IS PORTAL 3????

Portal 2 is a great game.  Story line is good, puzzles are challenging, I like the twist in the middle where the antagonist changes which results in an overall change in the sense of the game, like it is two games in one.  I also liked how it played off the same initial levels as where in Portal (1), kind of gave you a familiar feeling to the game.  I really liked this game.

Overall, I really enjoyed playing this game. It was fun to play these mind-boggling puzzles, and had some really mood-lightening humor along with it. From time to time, I would get stuck. At one point I stopped playing the game for a few months because of how angry the puzzle made me. If this happens to you, it helps to occasionally check online guides. Also, if you haven't played Portal 1, you probably won't understand a lot of references mentioned during single player. The multiplayer also complimented the story very nicely. It was cool to play as Aperture robots. I would recommend this game to anyone that enjoys puzzles (obviously) and is okay with a game that isn't too fast paced.

This game is amazing and I think it should be used in schools as a problem solving subject.
You really have to think a lot and be very creative!!!  :D

Игра более чем достоина своего звания игры года. И дело здесь не в геймплее и головоломках. Они конечно не пллохие, но не сверхгениальные да и игра на одних головоломках не очень то интересна. Дело в захватывающем сюжете, проработаных персонажей и диалогах состоящих только из острот и шуток. И атмосфера представляет собой юморной Half-life/
thank god british """people""" aren't real

There are two things I like in Portal:
The story and the graphic (maybe there are games with better graphic today, but I think that the graphic here is allright).
The story has an open end and takes place at the same time and dimension than Half-Life,
so there are many ways how the story could go on, and I look forward to play the next part (if there will be one)

So my opinion is, that it's a real good game, and it is worth to buy it.

In my opinion, a very good game. I will be going through a few pros and cons, and a short description of what the game will offer you. It contains a few spoilers, so be warned.

Now,  moving on.
A few of the pros:

This game contains a unique gameplay experience and story, unlike seen in any other game I've played before. Each test is different in it's own way, and sometimes it can lead to a person raging, it can be very, very fun. If the player has completed singleplayer, there is the co-op mode, the option to make your own maps, and to play other self-made maps.

A few of the cons:
The thing that annoys me is that they give you little tutorial, and you would never know that the button E interacts with things. It can be very frustrating for new players. Also, there is absolutely no replay value in the singleplayer and co-op gameplay.

TL;DR - It's a good game. Buy it,
I've completed the game many times, and i will be completing it many more times. The game is just amazin'. It's portal!
Worth your time and money; enough said!

打包的传送门是我在steam入手的第一款游戏。
对于这个游戏的可玩性和创意，我只能说“哇哦”，从来没有玩过如此有创意的游戏。对于作者的想象深感佩服。
以前玩过不少解密类游戏，但是3d化比较完美的，可能也只有传送门了。

说一下游戏里面的问题
我的操作系统是Mac OSX 10.10 ，Portal 1 文字显示不完全，Portal 2 则压根就看不见鼠标指针，已经反映给客服，但是至今没有回应。
对游戏的可玩性我给10分，但是对于其在Mac中的优化，3分嫌多。

Portal 2 fixed the only problem I had with Portal: length, or rather, lack thereof. But it didn't stop there. Portal 2 was expanded in all the best ways. More great game mechanics, beautifully crafted environments around Aperture, more wit and humor from the likes of two new and well-written characters, even some plot twists I won't spoil for you here, and of course, more recently, a community level editor, which allows the game to have as much content as we give it.

Portal 2-perełka studia Valve. Łada grafika a gameplay nigdy nie nudzi. Single świetny ale w co-opie się bawiłem najlepiej ze swoim znajomym :D. Genialną sprawą jest też możliwość tworzenia własnych map oraz ściągania ich.

Migliore del predecessore sotto tutti i punti di vista: longevo, vario e divertente. Incredibilmente sono riusciti ad infilarci dentro persino una trama, due tra i personeggi a dir poco esilaranti e carismatici e quello che secondo me e' il finale piu' epico della storia dei videogiochi.
